analyzed: manussā vihāra cārikam āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo bahū patte sannicayaṁ karissanti, pattavāṇijjaṁ vā bhikkhuniyo karissanti, āmattikāpaṇaṁ vā pasāressantī”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhuniyaḥ bahū patte sannicayam karissanti patta vāṇijjam vā bhikkhuniyaḥ karissanti āmattikā paṇam vā pasāressanti iti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.

analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti
katham hi nāma chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ patta sannicayam karissanti iti pe

original: Tāya bhikkhuniyā saṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṁ bhikkhunīnaṁ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīditvā añjaliṁ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
analyzed: tāya bhikkhuniyā saṅgham upasaṅkamitvā ekasam uttarāsaṅgam karitvā vuḍḍhānam bhikkhunīnam pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikam nisīditvā añjalim paggahetvā evam assa vacanīyaḥ

original: “ayaṁ me, ayye, patto rattātikkanto nissaggiyo, imāhaṁ saṅghassa nissajjāmī”ti.
analyzed: ayam me ayye pattaḥ ratta atikkantaḥ nissaggiyaḥ imā aham saṅghassa nissajjāmi iti
nissajjitvā āpatti desetabbā
byattāya bhikkhuniyā paṭibalāya āpatti paṭiggahetabbā
nissaṭṭha pattaḥ dātabbaḥ
suṇātu me ayye saṅghaḥ

original: Ayaṁ patto itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā nissaggiyo saṅghassa nissaṭṭho.
analyzed: ayam pattaḥ itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā nissaggiyaḥ saṅghassa nissaṭṭhaḥ

original: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho imaṁ pattaṁ itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā dadeyyā”ti.

original: Tāya bhikkhuniyā sambahulā bhikkhuniyo upasaṅkamitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṁ bhikkhunīnaṁ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīditvā añjaliṁ paggahetvā evamassu vacanīyā—

original: “ayaṁ me, ayyāyo, patto rattātikkanto nissaggiyo, imāhaṁ ayyānaṁ nissajjāmī”ti.
